name: @perspect3vism/ad4m-executor
description: Node.js package that allows the running/interfacing of AD4M Languages & Perspectives.

scripts.prepare-test: rm -rf src/test-temp && ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && nix-shell --run ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && npm run inject-language-language && npm run publish-test-languages && npm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test-no-nix: rm -rf src/test-temp && ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && npm run inject-language-language && npm run publish-test-languages && npm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test:windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/build-test-language.ps1 && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.ps1 && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && npm run inject-language-language && npm run publish-test-languages && npm run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.test: npm run prepare-test && nix-shell --run "npm run test-all" && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test-no-nix: npm run prepare-test-no-nix && npm run test-all && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test-auth: npm run prepare-test && jest --forceExit src/tests/authentication.test.ts && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test:windows: npm run prepare-test:windows && npm run test-all:windows && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
